while running a reactor python script on linux, for a loop larger than
a cr=
itical size, the program suddenly stops, with 
 
--Fatal Python error: deal=
locating None
I inserted 
>print sys.getrefcount(None)
in my loop and the v=
ariable None decreases at each step by non-unity
integers.  The program cra=
shes when this value reaches around 0.

Any idea where the bug comes from a=
nd how to fix it?
